items.title: Polanski’s Perfectly Timely J’accuse
items.description: An Officer and a Spy parallels the devastating history of the Dreyfus Affair with lawfare.

items.title: What an Acceptable Russia-Ukraine Deal Might Look Like
items.description: The best that can be hoped for is an armistice with an underpinning firm enough to deter Russia from resuming its war when it is ready.

items.title: A Tax Law for Manufacturers, but a Trade Policy Against Them
items.description: While the OBBBA tries to buoy manufacturing, President Trump’s tariffs are an anvil dragging the sector down.

items.title: New York Is Grappling with Its Own Kind of Mayhem
items.description: While Trump cracks down on D.C. violence, Gotham is in a similar situation; crime is dropping, but is still too frequent and arbitrary to give residen...

items.title: Judge Declines Trump DOJ Request to Unseal Epstein Grand Jury Testimony
items.description: The Justice Department could appeal the ruling, but doing so would be foolish.
